metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16852 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: shibsp/metadata/DynamicMetadataProvider.cpp in the Dynamic MetadataProvider plugin in Shibboleth Service Provider before 2.6.1 fails to properly configure itself with the MetadataFilter plugins and does not perform critical security checks such as signature verification, enforcement of validity periods, and other checks specific to deployments, aka SSPCPP-763.

criterions.comment: shibboleth-sp2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
